channel.title: My Let's Play Black Mesa Source PC HD series
channel.description:
Hello guys,
Awesome work! I've launched a Let's Play Black Mesa Source PC HD series on YouTube (the link to the playlist can be found in the upper left corner of the vid). More vids will be uploaded within 24 hours.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MO00_XiAD2Q[/url]
Please Like and Subscribe if you like the video! ^_^
Some area appear grittier than I would have liked but except for that inconsequential bit, over all you did an awesome job guys!
Will post a review soon on my website soon:
[url]https://imbacore.blogspot.com/[/url]
Part 2 now being uploaded. Part 3 being edited (levels, gamma, saturation, etc). Both should be up within the next 12 hours if no one tinkers with my PC (nephews and cousins have come a-visiting).

item.title: My Let's Play Black Mesa Source PC HD series
item.dc:creator: ildamos
item.description:
Thanks but a lot of my friends still look for “Black Mesa Source” when googling. I guess the name stuck. I’m still putting it up as “Black Mesa Source” as it would be easier to find.

Part 11 is up by the way: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hir4FKSpsOo&feature=plcp

item.source: My Let's Play Black Mesa Source PC HD series

item.title: My Let's Play Black Mesa Source PC HD series
item.dc:creator: ildamos
item.description:
Whoa. Whoa. Competitors! Kidding! I follow Athene’s “Together to the Top” mindset to come one come all!

I think there are Copyrights. I don’t wanna do something bad. So I’ve got a question for you. Is it possible to get the Copyrights? I would be very happy, if I get them. Please contact me if there’s a possibility.

I don’t think they’d be averse to people doing Let’s Plays ---- for one the playthroughs even further spread the word of their mod. Second, I don’t think they’re allowed to sell anything as the Half-Life franchise is Valve’s. But I’m not one of the devs.

Devs? Your thoughts?

should I name the videos with the chapters that are being played?

Better that way; more convenient for viewers.

In MY neck of the woods, Parts 1-4 are already live.

Here’s Part 1:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MO00_XiAD2Q&list=PL8z5KevvdJP35tvB7-vvLMn24j4ehLF9k&index=1&feature=plpp_video

Here’s the entire playlist:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL8z5KevvdJP35tvB7-vvLMn24j4ehLF9k&feature=plcp

(Links to the playlist and subsequent parts are also provided on the upper left and right corners of each video.)

The 19-minute, 28-second Part 5 clip is now live.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g25_Oioyd0E&feature=youtu.be

I’M A DOCTOR NOT AN ACROBAAAAAAAAAAAA----falls to my death. Lawl!

Died 5x in this one. >.<

Part 6 is now up. This time it’s a 32-minute long playthrough. I just discovered Handbrake, allowing me to compress my videos to manageable sizes. Now I can upload more vids in a single day or upload one massive longplay.

I hope you like this one:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D9Zy9KtEur0

(A link to the full playlist can be found on the upper left of the video; click. )

Parts 8 and 9 of my “Let’s Play Black Mesa: Source HD” series are now live.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GxKFMv4szXU

Getting chewed up because of the MP5’s microscopic reticule.

Read full topic

Hello everyone, I’m making a walkthrough of this enormous game without annoying voice comments, I hope you like it!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ahrTUV9gJjA

P.S.: The next one will be recorded with Source Recorder, having better quality and framerate!, should I name the videos with the chapters that are being played?

item.title: My Let's Play Black Mesa Source PC HD series
item.dc:creator: TheFlashgamerLP
item.description:
(I’m german. Sorry for bad english

Hello!

I like your Mod. It’s realy cool. So I thinked, I have to Stream it in a Let’s Play. But there’s such a problem. I think there are Copyrights. I don’t wanna do something bad. So I’ve got a question for you. Is it possible to get the Copyrights? I would be very happy, if I get them. Please contact me if there’s a possibility.

Thanks in advance.
TheFlashgamerLP

Read full topic
